name: dimension-shift
contents:
# Dimension Shift

Recharge 33%, swift, concentration; you shift into the same position in the Ethereal or Shadow plane, or other coterminous plane.
bodyHtml:
Dimension Shift

Recharge 33%, swift, concentration; you shift into the same position in the Ethereal or Shadow plane, or other coterminous plane.

name: empathic-feedback
contents:
# Empathic Feedback

When enemies strike you for damage, they feel your pain, suffering equal psychic damage to what you suffered.
bodyHtml:
Empathic Feedback

When enemies strike you for damage, they feel your pain, suffering equal psychic damage to what you suffered.

name: flight
contents:
# Flight

Fly at (base move), overland is faster
bodyHtml:
Flight

Fly at (base move), overland is faster

name: incarnate
contents:
# Incarnate

Create a semi-sentient "minion" out of a Power you know (see details, lol)
bodyHtml:
Incarnate

Create a semi-sentient "minion" out of a Power you know (see details, lol)

name: iron-fist
contents:
# Iron Fist

1 Focus; unarmed strike inflicts heavy lethal damage or dual-wield medium damage.
bodyHtml:
Iron Fist

1 Focus; unarmed strike inflicts heavy lethal damage or dual-wield medium damage.

name: levitation
contents:
# Levitation

Levitate up to (base move), move horizontally at (base move)
bodyHtml:
Levitation

Levitate up to (base move), move horizontally at (base move)

name: mark-recall
contents:
# Mark/Recall

At-will, swift; you mark your place in space and time. Record your position, HP, conditions, etc. Later, you can use recall: Recharge 33%, swift, you rewind time to the Marked position, affecting only you.
bodyHtml:
Mark/Recall

At-will, swift; you mark your place in space and time. Record your position, HP, conditions, etc. Later, you can use recall: Recharge 33%, swift, you rewind time to the Marked position, affecting only you.

name: metaphysical-weapon
contents:
# Metaphysical Weapon

At-will, swift; create an astral construct in the form of a weapon with which you are proficient. At higher ranks, enhance it.
bodyHtml:
Metaphysical Weapon

At-will, swift; create an astral construct in the form of a weapon with which you are proficient. At higher ranks, enhance it.

name: momentum-control
contents:
# Momentum Control

Arrest a charge or cancel falling damage, gain a kinetic charge.
bodyHtml:
Momentum Control

Arrest a charge or cancel falling damage, gain a kinetic charge.

name: phase-shift-incorporeal
contents:
# Phase Shift (Incorporeal)

Recharge 33%, swift, concentration; you become incorporeal.
bodyHtml:
Phase Shift (Incorporeal)

Recharge 33%, swift, concentration; you become incorporeal.

name: phase-shift
contents:
# Phase Shift

2 Focus; change your body to liquid or gas, and back again.
bodyHtml:
Phase Shift

2 Focus; change your body to liquid or gas, and back again.

name: speed-of-thought
contents:
# Speed of Thought

At-will, move, 1 Focus; move near instantly in a straight line by compressing the space in between for a nanosecond. Expend Focus to use as a reaction.
bodyHtml:
Speed of Thought

At-will, move, 1 Focus; move near instantly in a straight line by compressing the space in between for a nanosecond. Expend Focus to use as a reaction.

contents:
# Super Flight

bodyHtml:

Fly at the speed of a plane

name: temporal-acceleration
contents:
# Temporal Acceleration

Free; you immediately take a single action out of the flow of time. (Time Stop rules). One round per encounter per rank above 2.
bodyHtml:
Temporal Acceleration

Free; you immediately take a single action out of the flow of time. (Time Stop rules). One round per encounter per rank above 2.

name: thick-skin
contents:
# Thick Skin

1 Focus; gain DR equal to your proficiency bonus.
bodyHtml:
Thick Skin

1 Focus; gain DR equal to your proficiency bonus.

Nearby allies' mental defenses are enhanced.
